constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 153 (Friday, September 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DAVIDS of Kansas:
H.R. 5160.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following: Article I, Section 8, Clause 1: ``The
Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the . . .
general welfare of the United States; . . .''
[Page H4506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

title: Native American Entrepreneurial Opportunity Act
